title: >>> The Final FIGHT
body_text:
This is the first entry to be posted from an entirely different state. The current writer of dodgeball is on a camping trip in Pennsylvania, using the one computer in the general store on site.
________________________________________
__
This is it. It doesn't get any bigger than this next match-up. The anticipation is at its highest: The Iconic Champion Kevin Adams defends against "The Creation" John Tronolone. You know the deal already ... the winner goes into DODGEBALL 50 as the Undisputed World Heavyweight Champion.
..........
DODGEBALL 49 is perhaps the most significant non-"ten" event in history. For in less than two weeks, the world will witness DODGEBALL 50, emanating from the renown Ocean Road Park where it
all
began some eleven months ago. It has been a ride many will never forget, but one that is still far, far from over.
Past "nine" events have been remarkable, catapulting players into the very "ten" event which followed. From a "Wet War" and night two of a double header at 9 and 19, to a comedic raffle and the beginnings of the captains crown at 29 and 39, this upcoming event will in hopes surpass them all, thus giving the final preview of one DODGEBALL 50.
The last Wall High School event for three weeks comes crashing into the very tennis courts that helped make all of the seasons as memorable as possible.
>>> July 22nd the date, 6:30pm the time: It's DODGEBALL 49.
body_html:
This is the first entry to be posted from an entirely different state. The current writer of dodgeball is on a camping trip in Pennsylvania, using the one computer in the general store on site.
__________________________________________

This is it. It doesn't get any bigger than this next match-up. The anticipation is at its highest: The Iconic Champion Kevin Adams defends against "The Creation" John Tronolone. You know the deal already ... the winner goes into DODGEBALL 50 as the Undisputed World Heavyweight Champion.

..........

DODGEBALL 49 is perhaps the most significant non-"ten" event in history. For in less than two weeks, the world will witness DODGEBALL 50, emanating from the renown Ocean Road Park where it all began some eleven months ago. It has been a ride many will never forget, but one that is still far, far from over.

Past "nine" events have been remarkable, catapulting players into the very "ten" event which followed. From a "Wet War" and night two of a double header at 9 and 19, to a comedic raffle and the beginnings of the captains crown at 29 and 39, this upcoming event will in hopes surpass them all, thus giving the final preview of one DODGEBALL 50.

The last Wall High School event for three weeks comes crashing into the very tennis courts that helped make all of the seasons as memorable as possible.

>>> July 22nd the date, 6:30pm the time: It's DODGEBALL 49.
